instruction: Shorten the news article to less than 100 words.
input:
Nokia’s flagship 5G smartphones offer enhanced performance and multimedia experiences for users.

Nokia recently announced the launch of its flagship 5G smartphones: the Nokia 8.3 and Nokia 5.3. Both devices will enjoy a range of enhanced performance and multimedia experiences thanks to powerful processing, an AI-driven camera, and a range of advanced 5G connectivity options.
output: Nokia recently announced the launch of two new 5G smartphones with enhanced performance and multimedia experiences: the Nokia 8.3 and Nokia 5.3. These devices offer powerful processing, an AI-driven camera and advanced 5G connectivity options.
